track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description: Join University CodeSprint 2 and represent your school to prove how well students and graduates from your school can code! Win $15,000 in cash prizes, champion shirts.
primary_contest.name: University CodeSprint 2

model.name: The Story of a Tree
model.php_template:
<?php

$handle = fopen ("php://stdin","r");
fscanf($handle,"%d",$q);
for($a0 = 0; $a0 < $q; $a0++){
    fscanf($handle,"%d",$n);
    for($a1 = 0; $a1 < $n-1; $a1++){
        fscanf($handle,"%d %d",$u,$v);
    }
    fscanf($handle,"%d %d",$g,$k);
    for($a1 = 0; $a1 < $g; $a1++){
        fscanf($handle,"%d %d",$u,$v);
    }
}

?>
model.ruby_template:
#!/bin/ruby

q = gets.strip.to_i
for a0 in (0..q-1)
    n = gets.strip.to_i
    for a1 in (0..n-1-1)
        u,v = gets.strip.split(' ')
        u = u.to_i
        v = v.to_i
    end
    g,k = gets.strip.split(' ')
    g = g.to_i
    k = k.to_i
    for a1 in (0..g-1)
        u,v = gets.strip.split(' ')
        u = u.to_i
        v = v.to_i
    end
end
model.haskell_template:
import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad
import System.IO


main :: IO ()
main = do
    q_temp <- getLine
    let q = read q_temp :: Int
    forM_ [1..q] $ \a0  -> do
        n_temp <- getLine
        let n = read n_temp :: Int
        forM_ [1..n-1] $ \a1  -> do
            u_temp <- getLine
            let u_t = words u_temp
            let u = read $ u_t!!0 :: Int
            let v = read $ u_t!!1 :: Int

        g_temp <- getLine
        let g_t = words g_temp
        let g = read $ g_t!!0 :: Int
        let k = read $ g_t!!1 :: Int
        forM_ [1..g] $ \a1  -> do
            u_temp <- getLine
            let u_t = words u_temp
            let u = read $ u_t!!0 :: Int
            let v = read $ u_t!!1 :: Int



getMultipleLines :: Int -> IO [String]

getMultipleLines n
    | n <= 0 = return []
    | otherwise = do          
        x <- getLine         
        xs <- getMultipleLines (n-1)    
        let ret = (x:xs)    
        return ret
model.preview: Help Alice find the probability of winning a game played on a Tree with Bob.
model.clojure_template:
(use '[clojure.string :only (split triml)])

(
        let [
          q_t (read-line) 
          q (Integer/parseInt q_t) 
        ]

      (
        loop [a0 q]
        (when (> a0 0)

          (
            let [
              n_t (read-line) 
              n (Integer/parseInt n_t) 
            ]
          )

          (
            loop [a1 n-1]
            (when (> a1 0)

              (
                let [
                  u_temp (read-line) 
                  u_t (split u_temp #"\s+") 
                  u (Integer/parseInt (u_t 0)) 
                  v (Integer/parseInt (u_t 1)) 
                ]
              )

            (recur (- a1 1) ) )
          )

          (
            let [
              g_temp (read-line) 
              g_t (split g_temp #"\s+") 
              g (Integer/parseInt (g_t 0)) 
              k (Integer/parseInt (g_t 1)) 
            ]
          )

          (
            loop [a1 g]
            (when (> a1 0)

              (
                let [
                  u_temp (read-line) 
                  u_t (split u_temp #"\s+") 
                  u (Integer/parseInt (u_t 0)) 
                  v (Integer/parseInt (u_t 1)) 
                ]
              )

            (recur (- a1 1) ) )
          )

        (recur (- a0 1) ) )
      )

)
model.erlang_template:
-module(solution).
-export([main/0]).

main() ->

    { ok, [Q]} = io:fread("", "~d"),
    Q_list = lists:seq(1,Q),
    lists:foreach( fun(Q0) ->
            { ok, [N]} = io:fread("", "~d"),
            N-1_list = lists:seq(1,N-1),
            lists:foreach( fun(N-11) ->
                    { ok, [U,V]} = io:fread("", "~d~d")
            end,N-1_list),
            { ok, [G,K]} = io:fread("", "~d~d"),
            G_list = lists:seq(1,G),
            lists:foreach( fun(G1) ->
                    { ok, [U,V]} = io:fread("", "~d~d")
            end,G_list)
    end,Q_list),
    true.

read_array(0,D) -> [];
read_array(N,D) -> 
	{ok, [X]} = io:fread("", D),
	[X | read_array(N-1,D)].

read_2darray(0,M,D) -> [];
read_2darray(N,M,D) ->
	Q=read_array(M,D),
	[Q | read_2darray(N-1,M,D)].
model.lua_template:
q = io.read("*number", "*l")
a0 = 0
while a0 < q do
    n = io.read("*number", "*l")
    a1 = 0
    while a1 < n-1 do
        u,v = io.read("*number", "*number", "*l")
        a1 = a1 + 1
    end
    g,k = io.read("*number", "*number", "*l")
    a1 = 0
    while a1 < g do
        u,v = io.read("*number", "*number", "*l")
        a1 = a1 + 1
    end
    a0 = a0 + 1
end
